mapper.insert: insert into cooperat_message(sGuid, sName, sPhone, sCompany, sDescription, status, addTime) values(#{sGuid},#{sName},#{sPhone},#{sCompany},#{sDescription},#{status},sysDate())
mapper.select: SELECT sGuid, sName, sPhone, sCompany, sDescription, status, addTime FROM cooperat_message order by addTime desc LIMIT #{recordStart},#{recordEnd}
